name: Background
description: Add a background of your choosing
css:
/* Rounded Context Menu */
:root {--background: url('https://i.imgur.com/DZsnDro.png');--chat-transparency: 0.8;--sides-transparency: 0.9;--sides-blur: 5px;}  .theme-dark {--color-primary:54,57,63;--color-secondary:47,49,54;--color-secondary-alt:41,43,47;--color-tertiary:32,34,37;}.theme-light {--color-primary:255,255,255;--color-secondary:242,243,245;--color-secondary-alt:235,237,239;--color-tertiary:227,229,232;}body, .app-2CXKsg, .bg-1QIAus {background:transparent}#app-mount {background:var(--background) center/cover no-repeat}#app-mount>.app-3xd6d0>:not(.app-2CXKsg) {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))!important;backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}:focus {outline:none}.enterDone-menWZ8>.verification-2oQUwN {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}#app-mount>.errorPage-2pZ2Kq {background-color:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.artwork-L5TAwQ {display:none}.withFrame-2dL45i {padding-top:4px;margin-top:0;background:rgba(var(--color-tertiary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.wrapper-1_HaEi {background:transparent}.scroller-3X7KbA {background:rgba(var(--color-tertiary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}#app-mount .sidebar-1tnWFu, .notice-1x8lm- {border-radius:0}.sidebar-1tnWFu {background:transparent}.sidebar-1tnWFu {backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.container-1NXEtd {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--sides-transparency))}.scroller-WSmht3 {background:transparent}.privateChannels-oVe7HL {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--sides-transparency))}.applicationStore-2nk7Lo {background:transparent}.scroller-29cQFV {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.sidebar-1tnWFu>.scrollerBase-_bVAAt {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--sides-transparency))}#app-mount .pageWrapper-2PwDoS, #app-mount .scroller-RfJjkV {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.members-3WRCEx, .members-3WRCEx>div, .membersWrap-3NUR2t, .tabs-1RhQha, .container-NkLXgf, .container-2o3qEW {background:transparent}.chatContent-3KubbW + div, .scroller-3KyaqJ + div {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.panels-3wFtMD {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary-alt),var(--sides-transparency))}.chat-2ZfjoI, .container-3XgAHv {background:transparent}.chatContent-3KubbW, .chat-1rZYgu {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}#app-mount .form-3gdLxP:before {display:none}.wrapper-3HVHpV, .wrapper-15CKyy {background:transparent}.content-3spvdd {background:transparent;backdrop-filter:blur(5px)}.chat-2ZfjoI.threadSidebarOpen-1LSXvU {border-radius:0}.container-3XgAHv {margin-left:0;border-radius:0}.resizeHandle-PBRzPC {background:rgba(var(--color-tertiary),var(--chat-transparency))}.channelTextArea-1VQBuV {background:transparent;backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.theme-dark .chatContent-3KubbW .scrollableContainer-15eg7h {background:rgba(64,68,75,var(--chat-transparency))}.theme-light .chatContent-3KubbW .scrollableContainer-15eg7h {background:rgba(235,237,239,var(--chat-transparency))}.chatContent-3KubbW .container-A2jo65 {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.scrollerSpacer-3AqkT9 {height:22px}.scrollerSpacer-3AqkT9.empty-26e_55 {height:8px}.form-3gdLxP {margin-top:0}.jumpToPresentBar-1cEnH0, .messagesErrorBar-1IQ1rH {bottom:-8px}.spamBanner-1auiob {position:relative}.invite-3uuHYQ {backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.wrapper-1HIH0j, .embedFull-1HGV2S {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.reaction-2A2y9y {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.reaction-2A2y9y:hover {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.scroller-3KyaqJ {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.noChannel-1GDIAZ {background:rgba(var(--color-tertiary),var(--chat-transparency))}.wrapper-1w686E {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.theme-dark .navigationBar-3r0IQK {background-color:rgba(var(--color-tertiary),var(--sides-transparency))}.container-ZMc96U.themed-Hp1KC_ {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}#app-mount .children-3xh0VB:after {display:none}#app-mount .wrapper-1gVUIN {background:transparent}.callContainer-HtHELf {background:transparent}.container-cH6QoY, .callContainer-BGIngG, .scroller-35tvpe, .container-3r7mfc, .rowContainer-jDvyA4, .participants-3hk3ND, .tileContainer-Os085F, .container-lqPArA {background:transparent}.headerContainer-21E-jZ {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.container-lqPArA>.contentContainer-dKJ2Bn {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.sidebarVisible-3bgZKv {margin-right:0;border-radius:0}.scroller-35tvpe::-webkit-scrollbar-track {display:none}.scroller-35tvpe::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {background:var(--background-floating)}.root-22AK9z {background:rgba(24,25,28,var(--chat-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}#app-mount .container-2cd8Mz, .nowPlayingColumn-1eCBCN {background:transparent}.peopleColumn-1wMU14 {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.container-1oAagU {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.header-2EadGG {background:transparent}.scroller-2XLwLg, .scroller-1TOeMq, .scroller-s-wehS {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.layer-86YKbF, .standardSidebarView-E9Pc3j, .contentRegionScroller-2_GT_N {background:transparent}.sidebarRegionScroller-FXiQOh {background:rgba(var(--color-secondary),var(--sides-transparency));backdrop-filter:blur(var(--sides-blur))}.contentRegion-3HkfJJ {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.titleContainer-3fPic2::before, .stickyHeader-1Sunlx::before, .header-JUTO-g::before {background:var(--background) center/cover fixed}.titleContainer-3fPic2::after, .stickyHeader-1Sunlx::after, .header-JUTO-g::after {background:rgba(var(--color-primary),var(--chat-transparency))}.titleContainer-3fPic2::after, .titleContainer-3fPic2::before, .stickyHeader-1Sunlx::after, .stickyHeader-1Sunlx::before, .header-JUTO-g::after, .header-JUTO-g::before {content:"";position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;right:0;left:0;pointer-events:none;z-index:-1}.titleContainer-3fPic2::before, .titleContainer-3fPic2::after {height:100px}.hasCounter #MemberCount {background:transparent}
